question: the present population of a town is 1000 . population increase rate is 25 % p . a . find the population of town before 1 years ?

the total marks obtained by a student in physics , chemistry and mathematics is 150 more than the marks obtained by him in physics . what is the average mark obtained by him in chemistry and mathematics ?

a cubical block of metal weighs 5 pounds . how much will another cube of the same metal weigh if its sides are twice as long ?

a car is purchased on hire - purchase . the cash price is $ 26 000 and the terms are a deposit of 10 % of the price , then the balance to be paid off over 60 equal monthly installments . interest is charged at 12 % p . a . what is the monthly installment ?

if x is 30 percent more than y and y is 50 percent less than z , then x is what percent of z ?

niall ' s income is 60 % less than rex ' s income , and sam ' s income is 25 % less than niall ' s income . if rex gave 60 % of his income to sam and 40 % of his income to niall , niall ' s new income would be what fraction of sam ' s new income ?

a train with 120 wagons crosses john who is going in the same direction , in 36 seconds . it travels for half an hour from the time it starts ove ( who is also riding on his horse ) coming from the opposite direction in 24 seconds . in how much time after the train has crossed the mike do the john meets to mike ? rtaking the john ( he is riding on the horse ) before it starts overtaking the mike
find the cost of fencing around a circular field of diameter 40 m at the rate of rs . 3 a meter ?
a batsman makes a score of 87 runs in the 17 th match and thus increases his average by 3 . find his average after 17 th match
a marketing survey of anytown found that the ratio of trucks to sedans to motorcycles was 3 : 7 : 2 , respectively . given that there are 9,100 sedans in anytown , how many motorcycles are there ?
the average of 55 results is 28 and the average of other 28 results is 55 . what is the average of all the results ?
at what rate percent of simple interest will a sum of money double itself in 11 years ?
how many 3 - digit even numbers are possible such that if one of the digits is 5 , the next / succeeding digit to it should be 6

an alloy weighing 20 ounces is 70 percent gold . how many ounces of pure gold must be added to create an alloy that is 90 percent gold ?

the parameter of a square is equal to the perimeter of a rectangle of length 20 cm and breadth 16 cm . find the circumference of a semicircle whose diameter is equal to the side of the square . ( round off your answer to two decimal places ) ?
the average salary per month of 55 employees in a company is rs 8500 . if the managers salary is added , the average salary increases to rs 8800 , what is the salary of the manager ?

find the value of a / b + b / a , if a and b are the roots of the quadratic equation x 2 + 8 x + 4 = 0 ?

the ratio of buses to cars on river road is 1 to 13 . if there are 60 fewer buses than cars on river road , how many cars are on river road ?

two stations a and b are 200 km apart on a straight line . one train starts from a at 7 a . m . and travels towards b at 20 kmph . another train starts from b at 8 a . m . and travels towards a at a speed of 25 kmph . at what time will they meet ?
at what rate percent on simple interest will rs . 750 amount to rs . 1050 in 5 years ?
the length of a room is 7 m and width is 4.75 m . what is the cost of paying the floor by slabs at the rate of rs . 900 per sq . metre .

if the sides of a triangle are 20 cm , 12 cm and 16 cm , what is its area ?
the difference between a number and its two - fifth is 510 . what is 15 % of that number ?
if 10 gallons of grape juice are added to 30 gallons of a mixture , which contains 10 percent grape juice then what percent of the resulting mixture is grape juice ?

a merchant purchased a jacket for $ 60 and then determined a selling price that equalled the purchase price of the jacket plus a markup that was 20 percent of the selling price . during a sale , the merchant discounted the selling price by 20 percent and sold the jacket . what was the merchant ’ s gross profit on this sale ?

a certain number of horses and an equal number of men are going somewhere . half of the owners are on their horses ' back while the remaining ones are walking along leading their horses . if the number of legs walking on the ground is 80 , how many horses are there ?
find large number from below question the difference of two numbers is 1380 . on dividing the larger number by the smaller , we get 6 as quotient and the 15 as remainder

there are 76 lights which are functional and each is controlled by a separate on / off switch . two children a and b start playing with the switches . a starts by pressing every third switch till he reaches the end . b , thereafter , presses every fifth switch till he too reaches the end . if all switches were in off position at the beggining , how many lights are switched on by the end of this operation ?

what is the units digit of 32 ! + 50 ! + 2 ! + 4 ! ?
